title: Design is a Job

author: Mike Monteiro
description: This now has to be purchased in Zine form and that is a really fun format. I have both editions.

coverAlt: Illustration of a person studying and learning with books and a laptop
title: The Upskilling Imperative
subTitle: How to Build a Future-Ready Workforce
author: Shelly Osborne
description: Transformative insights! 'The Upskilling Imperative' is my go-to resource for shaping a future-ready workforce. It's practical, actionable, and has become an integral part of my day-to-day job. Highly recommend!
